title: Immersive Virtual Reality Learning Program for Preoperative Nursing Procedure Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic operating room environments and familiarity with patient safety protocols
context.additional_context: A re-education program for current professionals, featuring VR practical training followed by case application and feedback in offline workshops

learning_goals: Learners can perform pre-operative nursing procedures (infection control, equipment preparation, patient positioning) with 80% accuracy using hand-gesture recognition in an IVRLE environment
Learners can achieve scores of 4.0/5.0 or higher in VR simulation evaluation surveys across learning confidence, attitude, and knowledge acquisition categories
Learners can replicate procedures acquired in VR in actual clinical settings with over 70% accuracy within three blended learning sessions
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
